summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4664 for the improvement of the alley in Block 24, Pontius 4th Addition, being the alley between Yale Avenue North and Eastlake Avenue, from Denny Way to Stewart Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54093, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
